title: Alex Warren 2025 Tour Dates: How To Get Tickets

excerpt: Alex Warren has announced his first major headlining tour across the US for 2025, riding the success of his breakthrough hit "Ordinary." Learn how to get tickets and everything else to know.
text: Alex Warren has announced his first major headlining tour across the United States for 2025, riding the success of his breakthrough hit “Ordinary” and debut album You’ll Be Alright, Kid (Chapter 1). Dubbed the “Cheaper Than Therapy Tour,” the outing runs across America from May through October 2025 (get tickets here) Read on for complete details about this tour, including how to get tickets to sold-out shows, venue details, and everything you need to know. Get Alex Warren Tickets Here What Is Alex Warren’s 2025 Tour? Alex Warren’s 2025 “Cheaper Than Therapy Tour” marks his first major headline tour following his meteoric rise to fame, including his Billboard #2 hit “Ordinary” and debut album that has contributed to his impressive 1 billion+ career streams. The tour spans venues across the country, from intimate theaters to arenas to major music festivals, and will showcase his powerful vocals and emotional songwriting that have resonated with fans worldwide. html:
Alex Warren has announced his first major headlining tour across the United States for 2025, riding the success of his breakthrough hit “Ordinary” and debut album You’ll Be Alright, Kid (Chapter 1). Dubbed the “Cheaper Than Therapy Tour,” the outing runs across America from May through October 2025 (get tickets here)

Read on for complete details about this tour, including how to get tickets to sold-out shows, venue details, and everything you need to know.

Get Alex Warren Tickets Here

What Is Alex Warren’s 2025 Tour?

Alex Warren’s 2025 “Cheaper Than Therapy Tour” marks his first major headline tour following his meteoric rise to fame, including his Billboard #2 hit “Ordinary” and debut album that has contributed to his impressive 1 billion+ career streams. The tour spans venues across the country, from intimate theaters to arenas to major music festivals, and will showcase his powerful vocals and emotional songwriting that have resonated with fans worldwide.

Buy Alex Warren Tickets Here

Alex Warren Tickets: Limited Availability

Alex Warren’s 2025 tour tickets are in high demand, with many venues already sold out through primary channels. As such, secondary ticket marketplaces like get tickets here have become a primary option for securing tickets, especially for high-demand shows.

Where to Purchase Alex Warren Tickets

  • StubHub (recommended for sold-out shows or fans looking for deals)
  • Ticketmaster Verified Fan Resale

Alex Warren Tour: StubHub Tickets Guide

If you missed out on tickets during the initial on-sale for Alex Warren’s tour, StubHub offers a reliable alternative with their fan guarantee protection.

Buying Alex Warren Tickets Through StubHub

When to Check StubHub for Alex Warren Tickets:

  • Immediately after general on-sale if primary tickets sell out
  • 1-2 weeks before the concert as more tickets often become available
  • Last minute (1-3 days before the show) when ticket prices sometimes drop

StubHub Purchasing Process:

  1. Create or log into your StubHub account
  2. Search for “Alex Warren tickets” or the specific venue
  3. Filter by date, price range, and seat location
  4. Review the ticket details carefully (section, row, delivery method)
  5. Complete your purchase
  6. Receive tickets via mobile transfer or the StubHub app

StubHub Buyer Protections:

  • FanProtect™ Guarantee ensures valid tickets or your money back
  • 24/7 customer service
  • Secure transactions
  • Instant ticket delivery for many listings

Alex Warren Tour Ticket Prices: What to Expect

The tour’s popularity has created a dynamic secondary market with varying price points. Here’s the current broad pricing landscape on StubHub across all venues:

Nationwide Average Price Ranges

Premium/VIP Sections

  • Major Markets (LA, Chicago): $250-350
  • Mid-Sized Markets: $200-300
  • Smaller Markets: $175-250

Standard Floor Sections

  • Major Markets (LA, Chicago): $150-250
  • Mid-Sized Markets: $125-200
  • Smaller Markets: $100-175

Lower Level Reserved

  • Major Markets (LA, Chicago): $100-175
  • Mid-Sized Markets: $90-150
  • Smaller Markets: $75-125

Upper Level Seating

  • Major Markets (LA, Chicago): $70-120
  • Mid-Sized Markets: $60-100
  • Smaller Markets: $50-80

Note: Secondary market prices fluctuate based on demand, location, and timing. Prices typically start higher and may decrease closer to the event date.

Pro Tips for Securing Alex Warren Tour Tickets

  • Set price alerts on StubHub for your preferred shows
  • Check secondary markets immediately after pre-sales begin
  • Compare prices across different platforms
  • Watch for price drops 1-2 weeks before the event
  • Consider nearby cities if your local show is sold out

Anticipated Setlist

Alex Warren’s current tour setlist includes a mix of fan favorites like “Burning Down,” “Before You Leave Me,” and “Ordinary,” along with unreleased tracks such as “Never Be Far,” “Can’t Stop This,” and “Bloodline,” giving fans a glimpse of what’s next while closing with the emotional “Carry You Home.”

Alex Warren’s 2025 Tour – Frequently Asked Questions

Are there age restrictions for Alex Warren’s concerts? Age restrictions vary by venue. Check with the specific venue for their policy regarding minors attending the concert.

Is this Alex Warren’s first major tour? Yes, this is his first headline tour following the success of his debut album and breakout hit “Ordinary.”

Will more dates be added to the tour? Currently, dates from May through October have been announced. It’s unknown if additional dates will be added.

How long is a typical Alex Warren concert? Concerts typically last between 1.5 to 2 hours, featuring approximately 18-22 songs.

Where can I get the best ticket deals? StubHub often provides the best options for sold-out shows, with price alerts helping you find the best deals as they become available.

How can I stay updated on tour information? Fans can follow Alex Warren’s official social media channels for the latest updates.
